one each around the 3rd and 4th fpdc 1 chain it will get its own single_crochet in the next round 2 fpdc - one each around the 1st and 2nd fpdc on top of the work 1 chain to make the work a bit more loose round #16 repeat 9 times 6 single_crochet 2 fpdc 1 single_crochet into chain 2 fpdc round #17 repeat 9 times 6 single_crochet 2 fpdc single_crochet-increase 2 fpdc round #18 repeat 9 times skip single_crochet 4 single_crochet skip single_crochet 2 fpdc 2 single_crochet-increase 2 fpdc round #19 repeat 9 times 4 single_crochet 2 fpdc single_crochet-increase 2 single_crochet single_crochet-increase 2 fpdc round #20 repeat 9 times skip single_crochet 2 single_crochet skip single_crochet 2 fpdc single_crochet-increase 4 single_crochet single_crochet-increase 2 fpdc round #21 repeat 9 times skip single_crochet 1 single_crochet 2 fpdc single_crochet-increase 6 single_crochet single_crochet-increase 2 fpdc do not make the last two fpdc in the last repeat we need to finish the round a bit earlier if you mark the beginning/ending of the round you can move the marker 2 stitches backward round #22 now we will make a // crossing watch the video first https //www youtube com/watch v=zeootzt0g9a and then repeat 9 times 1 chain to make the work a bit more loose 2 fpdc - one each around the 3rd and 4th fpdc 1 chain it will get its own single_crochet in the next round 2 fpdc - one each around the 1st and 2nd fpdc - between the work and the two fpdc made a moment ago 1 chain to make the work a bit more loose single_crochet-increase 8 single_crochet single_crochet-increase magic carpet studio www facebook com/magiccarpetstudio/ www magiccarpetstudio blogspot com round #23 repeat 9 times 2 fpdc single_crochet into chain 2 fpdc 12 single_crochet round #24 repeat 9 times 2 fpdc single_crochet-increase 2 fpdc 12 single_crochet round #25 repeat 9 times 2 fpdc 2 single_crochet 2 fpdc 12 single_crochet round #26 repeat 9 times 2 fpdc 2 single_crochet-increase 2 fpdc 12 single_crochet round #27 repeat 9 times 2 fpdc skip single_crochet 2 single_crochet skip single_crochet 2 fpdc single_crochet-increase 10 single_crochet single_crochet-increase round #28 repeat 9 times 2 fpdc 2 single_crochet 2 fpdc 14 single_crochet round #29 repeat 9 times 2 fpdc skip single_crochet 1 single_crochet 2 fpdc single_crochet-increase 12 single_crochet single_crochet-increase round #30 another crossing
